title: Add Bollywood + Bharatanatyam dance-themed background to main page

requirements.text: Add a dance-themed background to the main page that visually includes both Bollywood-themed elements and Bharatanatyam (classical) themed elements, and apply it behind the existing content without changing existing product functionality.

quotes: Could you please modify the webpage with some dance themed background that includes some Bollywood themed and some Bharatanatyam classical themed.

acceptanceCriteria: When the app loads, a dance-themed background is visible across the full main page behind the header/main/footer content.

The background includes recognizable visual cues of both Bollywood-themed dance and Bharatanatyam classical dance (e.g., silhouettes/poses, costume-inspired shapes, ornamental motifs) without using any text in the artwork.
Foreground UI components (cards, dropdown, text) remain readable; background does not overpower content (e.g., via opacity/blur/overlay treatment).
Background scales responsively across common viewport sizes without obvious tiling seams or distortion.

requirements.text: Add the generated background image(s) as static frontend assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the app styling (do not route background images through the backend).

quotes: Could you please modify the webpage with some dance themed background that includes some Bollywood themed and some Bharatanatyam classical themed.

acceptanceCriteria: The generated image file(s) exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames specified in this build request.
The main page uses the generated asset(s) via CSS/background styling and the app builds successfully without missing-asset errors.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/immutablePaths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not add new UI features beyond applying the requested background (e.g., no new pages, no new interactive controls).
Do not implement any third-party image/CDN hosting; use local static assets only.

required: Dance-themed wide background illustration blending Bollywood dance energy (cinema/glamour-inspired motifs, dynamic silhouettes) with Bharatanatyam classical aesthetics (temple/kolam-inspired ornamentation, classical pose silhouette), warm saffron/terracotta palette, subtle and low-contrast (dance-background.dim_1920x1080.png)
